DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate brief parent-based adolescent sexual health intervention call Families Talking Together Plus ( FTT+ ) . FTT+ base establish intervention call Families Talking Together ( FTT ) enhance FTT add module human papillomavirus ( HPV ) . The goal study evaluate whether FTT help parent increase sexual health communication , delay adolescent sexual debut , increase HPV vaccination . FTT deliver parent minority youth deliver student nurse .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Trial Brief Parent-Based Adolescent Sexual Health Intervention
DOC.criteria: Age limit parent : minimum = N/A ( No limit ) ; maximum = N/A ( No limit ) Age limit child : minimum = 11 year ; maximum = 14 year Parent : resides child 1114 year old attends participate community center , afterschool program , Boys Girls Club ( BGC ) Parent : available facetoface small group session PI student nurse within 2 month consent assent participate study Parent : read , write , speak English Spanish Child : 1114 year age Parent : Without primary custody child Parent : Incarcerated Parent : Unable attend facetoface session within 2 month
